snippet: Journalists, opposition political figures and human rights workers have been either prevented from entering the European Union or informed that they are no longer permitted to leave Belarus.
abstract: Government of Belarus is apparently barring opponents of Pres Aleksandr G Lukashenko, which includes several journalists, opposition political figures and human rights workers, from leaving the former Soviet republic.
lead_paragraph: Journalists, opposition political figures and human rights workers have been either prevented from entering the European Union or informed that they are no longer permitted to leave Belarus.

headline.main: Belarus Bars Critics From Leaving the Country
headline.print_headline: Belarus: Critics of the Government Are Barred From Leaving the Country
